title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. I, pt. 6 - Payments Of Vendor Claims And Statutory Expenditures
content:

§ 6.2 - General requirements for claims

§ 6.6 - Certification of internal controls over the payment process
§ 6.7 - Supporting documentation and retention of records
§ 6.8 - Appropriation titles
§ 6.9 - Claims for reimbursement of cash expenditures

R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. I, pt. 6

Statutory authority: State Finance Law, §§8, 109, 109-a, 110;NYS Constitution, art. V, § 1
[FN*] Resolution filed March 5, 1962 was not published in the

Official Compilation. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
